comments: Porzingis (BOS) cleanly blocks Capela's (ATL) shot near the rim.
Murray (ATL) moves forward prior to marginal body contact occurring with Tatum (BOS) as Tatum moves the ball from side-to-side.
Bogdanovic (ATL) fails to fully clear the lane and is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Murray (ATL) cleanly deflects the ball away from Tatum (BOS) during his drive.
Matthews (ATL) and Tatum (BOS) briefly grasps each other's arms, and marginal contact occurs as they move towards the screen.
Porzingis (BOS) re-establishes slightly following the initial contact during the screen and further marginal contact occurs as Matthews (ATL) moves over it.
Tatum (BOS) is already in Hunter's (ATL) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Matthews (ATL) brings his left arm toward Brown's (BOS) path and marginal contact occurs with Brown's front as he is coming to a stop inside the lane.
Horford (BOS) legally contests Murray's (ATL) driving shot attempt.
Brown (BOS) does not bring his right hand to the ball prior to resuming his dribble.
Capela (ATL) and Tatum (BOS) engage and disengage with one another, and marginal contact occurs as they come together in the lane.
Matthews (ATL) is moving forward slightly towards Porzingis (BOS), and the contact off-ball is marginal.
Matthews (ATL) moves to align alongside Brown's (BOS) path and marginal body contact occurs during Brown's drive.
Brown (BOS) is bracing for the contact from Matthews (ATL), and marginal contact occurs as he releases away for his step back jump shot attempt.
Matthews (ATL) contests the jump shot attempt and marginal contact occurs with Brown's (BOS) slightly extended right foot after the release.
Capela (ATL) brings his right hand toward Horford's (BOS) right shoulder and marginal contact occurs as Capela cleanly deflecting the ball toward himself during the rebound.
Bogdanovic (ATL) brings his hands forward towards Tatum (BOS), and he removes his hands as Tatum begins to dribble.
Tatum (BOS) does not step out of bounds during his drive to the basket.
Bogdanovic (ATL) legally contests Tatum's (BOS) driving shot attempt.
Matthews (ATL) brings his left forearm toward Porzingis' (BOS) front and marginal contact occurs as Porzingis attempts the controlled tip.
Bogdanovic (ATL) legally contests Horford's (BOS) put-back attempt.
Tatum (BOS) slightly extends his left forearm towards Capela (ATL), and the contact as they pursue the rebound is marginal.
Tatum (BOS) briefly has his arms around Hunter's (ATL) upper half before correcting during the inbound.
